name: eVendor Check
overview:
eVendor Check, Inc. offers Web-based system for managing supply chain risk and compliance for enterprises. It offers eVendor Check System, which includes multiple references that complete confidential surveys online from client companies per potential vendor.

The companyâ€™s eVendor Check System archives data/reports for the documentation of due diligence process; features dashboard capabilities to provide summariesâ€“comparisons, vital statistics, and longitudinal tracking; integrates with existing automated vendor selection/management systems; and includes live help desk/customer service functions, as well as online guides and tutorials for utilizing the system. In addition, it offers online services, such as industry based analysis, trends, and white papers; ability to track a specific vendorâ€™s performance over time; benchmarking studies; vendor listings by industry and product/service based on research; and pre-screened vendor database.

The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Hawley, Pennsylvania.
